comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Miss Anne Nason won the prize for the best gross in the handicap medal play for women and also the Clyde Park Challenge Cup at the Country Club yesterday ...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Her emergence onto the golf scene is described on page 141 of American Golfer, December 1913: www.la84foundation.org/SportsLibrary/AmericanGolfer/1913/...
